headline: A Look at HP (HPQ) Valuation After JPMorgan Downgrade and Outlook Shift
summary: HP (HPQ) is on investors’ radars after JPMorgan shifted its rating to Neutral. This move was driven by concerns that the company is entering a more challenging period as the favorable PC volume and cost cycle winds down. See our latest analysis for HP. HP has seen its 90-day share price return bounce back by 8.4%, even with the JPMorgan downgrade and ongoing legal proceedings shaping market sentiment. Over the longer term, momentum has faded, with the total shareholder return over the past...
